price: Na hali Yeye kakuumbeni daraja baada ya daraja?
footnotes: Na hali Yeye ndiye aliye kuumbeni kwa madaraja, tangu tone ya manii, kisha pande la damu, kisha pande la nyama, kisha mafupa na nyama?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
